WorkItem.Description:
The `debugger;` statement is removed during compilation. It's a very handy way to quickly jump into specific point of code during it's execution.

Please include this statement in the resulting JS. Thanks.

Comments.Message: I'm not able to reproduce this issue. Can you share the code where you're seeing this problem?

Sorry for a mistake, i think i forgot to recompile while checking this (lack of working -watch flag really hurts :/ ).

I've checked that in many scenarios and it works very well. Thanks!
